About

The main bupaR packages have been developed by the Business Informatics research group of Hasselt University, and are maintained by Gert Janssenswillen. The packages are available under MIT license. Contributions can be made through our github repositories. Subscribe to our newsletter in order to get informed on new releases.



Contact

Gert Janssenswillen
Hasselt University
Campus Diepenbeek
Agoralaan Building D
gert.janssenswillen@uhasselt.be
www.janssenswillen.com

Research Group Business Informatics
www.businessinformatics.be

Pay tribute

bupaR is developed by volunteering academic researchers and provided for free. If you use it for your research, please be so kind to cite us.

Janssenswillen, G., Depaire, B., Swennen, M., Jans, M., & Vanhoof, K. (2019). bupaR: Enabling reproducible business process analysis. Knowledge-Based Systems, 163, 927-930.

To cite invidual packages, use the citation function in R.

citation("processmapR")
## 
## To cite package 'processmapR' in publications use:
## 
##   Gert Janssenswillen (2019). processmapR: Construct Process Maps
##   Using Event Data. https://www.bupar.net,
##   https://github.com/bupaverse/processmapr.
## 
## A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is
## 
##   @Manual{,
##     title = {processmapR: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data},
##     author = {Gert Janssenswillen},
##     year = {2019},
##     note = {https://www.bupar.net, https://github.com/bupaverse/processmapr},
##   }

Contribute

The source code of all the packages is available on github, so that you can directly contribute to the packages. If you want to contribute by creating new compatible packages, feel free to contact us.

Package Link
bupaR github.com/bupaverse/bupaR Submit issue
edeaR github.com/bupaverse/edeaR Submit issue
eventdataR github.com/bupaverse/eventdataR Submit issue
heuristicsmineR github.com/bupaverse/heuristicsmineR Submit issue
petrinetR github.com/bupaverse/petrinetR Submit issue
pm4py github.com/bupaverse/pm4py Submit issue
processanimateR github.com/bupaverse/processanimateR Submit issue
processmapR github.com/bupaverse/processmapR Submit issue
processmonitR github.com/bupaverse/processmonitR Submit issue
xesreadR github.com/bupaverse/xesreadR Submit issue
